Discussion - New Global Attributes for file naming
Discussion
- New Global Attributes for file naming

The GEOLEOVNIR or LEOLEOVNIR shall include an optional global attribute referencing the location of the associated SRF netCDF file.
The GEOLEOVNIR or LEOLEOVNIR shall include an optional
global attribute referencing the location of the associated SRF
netCDF file.

:srf_url = “URL of the SRF (netCDF) file”;
:srf_url = “URL of the SRF (netCDF) file”;

No impacts on GDWG activities – but what name do we recommend?
No impacts on GDWG activities – but what name do we recommend?
